title: Kiss Of Life
description: Every night, Alan Dexter has the same his former colleague Christina is seducing him when suddenly, two of her perfectly white teeth turn into fangs and tear into his flesh.Dexter is always the skeptical journalist, but his feeling that Christina must be in danger only grows when he discovers she disappeared over two months ago in the mysterious Carpathian Mountains.What evil still lurks in the heart of Transylvania?
author: Brian L. Porter
